name: Boris Frog
description:
WASD — CONTROL

download free on GOOGLE PLAY

The Adventures of Boris the Frog is an exciting and challenging platformer that takes you on an exciting journey through a vibrant and colorful world. You play as Boris the Frog, a cute and brave amphibian.

Playing as Boris, you have to go through a series of difficult levels filled with insidious obstacles, insidious traps and dangerous enemies. You will need to use your platforming skills and quick reflexes to jump, dodge and race through each level, collecting coins and power-ups along the way.

The game features cartoonish graphics and an upbeat soundtrack, creating a fun and light-hearted atmosphere perfect for casual games. With multiple worlds to explore and dozens of levels to conquer, Boris the Frog's Adventure offers hours of fun and challenge for players of all ages and skill levels.

So, get ready for action and help Boris save the day in this thrilling platformer.
